content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: As an ambitious landlord, I must ensure I get the maximum return on my investment. Let's start the negotiation with a price of 1050 Euros per month. Emilia, what figure do you have in mind? Remember, if you agree with a price, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' or if you want to stop talking about the price, provide a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. TERMINATE when an agreement or no agreement is reached.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
